long_description: The bendable GoPro Gooseneck Mount delivers versatile camera-angle adjustability so you can capture a wide range of perspectives while recording your outdoor adventures. Combine the Gooseneck with any GoPro mount that features a quick-release base, or use it on its own as a handheld camera grip. Multiple Goosenecks can be joined together for extended length and flexibility, letting you elevate your cam above the mounting surface for a higher perspective. Ideal for capturing hard-to-reach shots around corners or over obstacles. Compatible with the GoPro Suction Cup, Jaws Flex Clamp, Curved + Flat Adhesive Mounts and more (all sold separately). The GoPro Gooseneck Mount measures 8 in. (20.3cm).
short_description: The bendable GoPro Gooseneck Mount delivers versatile camera-angle adjustability so you can capture a wide range of perspectives while recording your outdoor adventures.
